2.11: Guai nyei jauv oix beu jienv meih, bieqc hnyouv nyei jauv yaac goux jienv meih,
2.16: Meih ziouc duqv simv nqoi hienx nqox nyei auv, se biaux ndutv nzuih mbiaangc, yuoqc mienh nyei m'sieqv dorn.

1.21: Ninh yiem nauc nyitc nyei jaai-daauh heuc, yaac yiem bieqc zingh gaengh nyei dorngx gorngv waac.
1.15: Yie nyei dorn aah! Maiv dungx gan ninh mbuo mingh! Maiv dungx bun meih nyei zaux caaiv ninh mbuo yangh nyei jauv,
1.12: Mbuo oix zorqv ninh mbuo liemh nangh naqv hnangv njiec yiemh gen, oix zorqv ninh mbuo ziangh dauh naqv hnangv njiec ndo haic nyei kuotv wuov deix mienh.
1.17: Norqc buatc jienv mienh zaeng mungz se maiv lamh longc.
1.30: Yie kuinx nyei waac meih mbuo maiv muangx yietc deix, daaux nzuonx meih mbuo mangc piex yie gorngv-njaaux nyei yietc zungv waac.
1.20: Cong-mengh se hnangv dauh m'sieqv dorn yiem jaai-horngc heuc, yiem domh zuangx zaamc ninh heuc qiex hlo nyei.
1.4: weic bun maiv hiuv haaix nyungc nyei mienh haih guai, yaac bun mienh lunx mienh guai, maaih hnyouv haih samx duqv cuotv,
1.28: “Wuov zanc meih mbuo oix heuc yie, yie yaac maiv dau. Meih mbuo oix zimh lorz yie, yaac lorz maiv buatc,
1.33: Mv baac haaix dauh muangx yie, wuov dauh ziouc baengh orn nyei yiem. Ninh duqv yiem longx, maiv gamh nziex zuqc zeqc naanc.”
1.19: Da'faanh longc orqv nyei jauv lorz zinh nyaanh yaac hnangv naaiv nor, zungv hoic nyaanh ziouv guangc maengc.
1.18: Naaiv deix mienh zuov jienv bun ganh zuqc daic, ninh mbuo zaeng mungz zorqv ganh nyei maengc.
1.22: Ninh gorngv, “Meih mbuo maiv hiuv haaix nyungc nyei mienh aah! Meih mbuo oix a'hneiv maiv hiuv haaix nyungc taux haaix zanc? Huotv mienh nyei mienh a'hneiv huotv ndongc haaix lauh? Mienh hngongx mienh oix nzorng wuonh zaang ndongc haaix lauh?
1.23: Yie gorngv-njaaux meih mbuo, meih mbuo oix zuqc muangx, yie ziouc bun meih mbuo hiuv duqv yie hnamv nyei jauv, yaac bun meih mbuo hiuv duqv yie nyei waac.
1.13: Mbuo ziouc duqv nyungc-nyungc jaaix nyei ga'naaiv, yaac zorqv luv daaih nyei ga'naaiv dapv buangv mbuo nyei biauv.
1.9: weic zuqc naaiv deix i nyungc benx nzueic haic nyei ningv ndongx jienv meih nyei m'nqorngv, yaac hnangv diuh jiem-limc dangh jienv meih nyei jaang nor.
1.26: Meih mbuo zuqc zeqc naanc yie ziouc jatv. Meih mbuo zuqc domh heiv sic haeqv meih mbuo, yie yaac huotv meih mbuo.
1.5: weic bun cong-mengh mienh muangx yaac haih jaa hoqc hiuv camv, bieqc hnyouv nyei mienh yaac haih maaih banh zeic,
1.27: Meih mbuo zuqc domh heiv sic hnangv domh nziaaux, meih mbuo zuqc nyei zeqc naanc hnangv nziaaux-zunc. Meih mbuo zuqc kouv, zuqc hnyouv mun nyei ziangh hoc yie yaac huotv meih mbuo.
1.14: Meih gunv caux yie mbuo maaih buonc, mbuo ziouc juangc yietc norm nyaanh mbuoqc.”
1.3: weic njaaux mienh yiem naaiv seix zaangc longc cong-mengh, zoux duqv horpc, zoux duqv baengh fim, hnyouv zingx nyei,
1.7: Wuonh zaang nyei gorn se oix zuqc taaih Ziouv.  Mienh hngongx mienh mangc piex cong-mengh caux njaaux nyei waac.
1.10: Yie nyei dorn aah! Se gorngv zuiz-mienh yuoqc meih, maiv dungx gan ninh mbuo.
1.2: weic bun mienh hiuv duqv cong-mengh caux njaaux nyei jauv, yaac bieqc hnyouv tengx mienh mengh baeqc nyei waac.
1.1: Naaiv se Ndaawitv nyei dorn, I^saa^laa^en nyei hungh, Saa^lo^morn, nyei cong-mengh waac. Naaiv deix cong-mengh waac se
1.31: Weic naaiv meih mbuo ziouc duqv puix meih mbuo zoux nyei sic, yaac zuqc ziux ganh daav nyei za'eix gaux haic aqv.
1.6: weic bun mienh haih mengh baeqc cong-mengh waac caux meiv jienv gorngv nyei waac, yaac bieqc hnyouv cong-mengh mienh nyei waac caux ninh mbuo nyei waac-ormv.
1.8: Yie nyei dorn aah! Oix zuqc muangx meih nyei die kuinx nyei waac, yaac maiv dungx guangc meih nyei maa njaaux nyei jauv,
1.24: Weic zuqc yie heuc meih mbuo, meih mbuo yaac maiv kangv muangx. Yie sung buoz yaapv, mienh yaac maiv guen maiv sic nyei.
1.25: Meih mbuo nqemh yie kuinx nyei yietc zungv waac. Yie gorngv-njaaux, meih mbuo yaac maiv kangv muangx.
1.29: weic zuqc meih mbuo nzorng wuonh zaang, meih mbuo yaac maiv ginv taaih Ziouv.
1.11: Se gorngv ninh mbuo gorngv, “Daaih maah! Caux yie mbuo mingh zuov jienv daix mienh, mbuo dangv jienv maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh.
1.32: Maiv hiuv haaix nyungc nyei mienh nqemh cong-mengh ziouc zuqc daic, mienh hngongx mienh maiv guen maiv sic ziouc zuqc mietc.
1.16: weic zuqc ninh mbuo nyei zaux tiux mingh zoux orqv, ninh mbuo beqv jienv oix daix mienh, bun nziaamv liouc cuotv.

31.21: Duih sorng nyei ziangh hoc ninh maiv nzauh ninh nyei biauv zong mienh, weic zuqc ninh nyei ziangh biauv mienh maaih lui-siouv zuqv.
31.15: Lungh maiv gaengh njang ninh jiez sin daaih mbenc nyanc hopv bun hmuangv doic, yaac paaiv gong bun ninh nyei m'sieqv bou.
31.12: Ninh yietc seix zoux longx bun ninh nyei nqox, yietc liuz maiv zoux haaix nyungc hoic.
31.17: Ninh cuotv qaqv zoux gong jienh, yaac bun ninh nyei buoz henv.
31.30: Mienh maaih yuoqc fei mv baac haih jaav nyei. Nzueic nyei jauv yaac haih jiex. Mv baac taaih Ziouv nyei m'sieqv dorn puix duqv ceng.
31.20: Ninh cuotv fim nzie mienh jomc mienh, yaac sung buoz tengx dangx-donx mienh.
31.4: “O Le^mu^en aah! Hungh diex maiv horpc zuqc, hungh diex maiv horpc zuqc hopv a'ngunc diuv. Zoux hlo gunv wuov dauh maiv horpc zuqc maaih hnyouv oix hopv diuv-kuv.
31.28: Ninh nyei fu'jueiv jiez daaih gorngv ninh maaih fuqv, ninh nyei nqox yaac ceng ninh gorngv,
31.19: Ninh weic ganh baeng suix yaac weic ganh ndatv ndie.
31.18: Ninh hiuv duqv ninh zoux daaih nyei huox maaih jaax-zinh, ninh lungh muonz buov dang zoux gong lauh nyei.
31.22: Ninh zoux dimc coux nyei ndie, yaac longc la'maah ndie-muonc caux setv luoqc nyei ndie zoux ganh nyei lui-houx.
31.23: Ninh nyei nqox caux buonv-deic mienh gox zueiz zingh gaengh nyei ziangh hoc, zuangx mienh hiuv duqv ninh nyei nqox.
31.13: Ninh lorz ba'gi yungh biei caux la'maah, a'hneiv longc buoz zoux gong.
31.9: Oix zuqc tengx gorngv yaac baengh fim nyei dunx sic. Oix zuqc beu jienv jomc nyei mienh caux dangx-donx mienh horpc zuqc duqv nyei leiz.”
31.26: Ninh nyei nzuih gorngv cong-mengh waac. Ninh yaac longc suonc nyei hnyouv njaaux.
31.5: Nziex hopv liuz ziouc la'kuqv leiz-latc, yaac bun zuqc kouv nyei yietc zungv mienh horpc zuqc duqv nyei leiz pien mingh.
31.27: Ninh zaangv longx ninh nyei jaa-dingh, maiv qopv jienv buoz yiem.
31.14: Ninh hnangv zoux saeng-eix nyei nzangv nor, wuonc ninh nyei nyanc hopv yiem go nyei daaih.
31.3: Maiv dungx zorqv meih nyei qaqv bun nzengc m'sieqv dorn, maiv dungx bun naaiv nyungc jauv hoic hungh diex zuqc baaic.
31.7: Bun ninh mbuo hopv ziouc la'kuqv jomc nyei jauv, maiv aengx jangx ninh mbuo nyei kouv naanc.
31.10: Haaix dauh haih lorz duqv ziangh horngh nyei auv? Ziangh horngh nyei auv gauh jaaix jiex la'bieiv-jaaix.
31.2: “O yie nyei dorn aah! O yie yungz nyei dorn aah! Yie laengz ngaengc waac duqv daaih nyei dorn aah! Yie oix zuqc njaaux haaix nyungc meih?
31.1: Naaiv se Le^mu^en Hungh douc nyei waac, se ninh nyei maa njaaux ninh wuov deix waac.
31.31: Tov bun ninh duqv zingh nyeic ziux ninh nyei buoz zoux nyei gong, yaac bun ninh zoux nyei gong yiem wuov zingh gaengh duqv mienh ceng.
31.6: Bun diuv-kuv aav lamh daic nyei mienh hopv, bun a'ngunc diuv hnyouv nzauh kouv nyei mienh.
31.8: “Oix zuqc tengx hngongx, maiv haih gorngv waac nyei mienh gorngv, yaac beu jienv yietc zungv doh naanc nyei mienh horpc zuqc duqv nyei leiz.
31.24: Ninh longc la'maah ndie-muonc zoux lui-houx maaic, yaac fungx la'sin maaic bun saeng-eix mienh.
31.25: Ninh maaih qaqv yaac duqv mienh taaih, ninh yaac jatv hoz nqaang nyei hnoi-nyieqc.
31.29: “Maaih ziangh horngh nyei m'sieqv dorn camv nyei, mv baac meih gauh ziangh horngh jiex.”
31.11: Ninh nyei nqox kaux duqv zuqc ninh, yaac maiv ndortv buonv aqv.
31.16: Ninh samx mangc lingh deic yaac maaiz daaih. Ninh longc ganh nyei buoz zornc daaih nyei nyaanh zoux huingx zuangx a'ngunc biouv.

6.21: Oix zuqc zanc-zanc zaangh jienv meih nyei hnyouv, yaac kuangx jienv meih nyei jaang.
6.15: Weic naaiv ninh oix liemh zeih zuqc zeqc naanc, nduqc dangh hnangv zuqc baaic waaic nzengc, maiv haih zorc.
6.12: Maiv lamh longc nyei orqv mienh jiex naaiv jiex wuov gorngv-baeqc.
6.17: Maaih m'zing-jaax hlang, gorngv-baeqc nyei nzuih, buoz daix maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh,
6.30: Se gorngv mienh hnyouv sie ziouc nimc ga'naaiv tengx ninh beuv, mienh mangc piex ninh maiv zeiz?
6.20: Yie nyei dorn aah! Oix zuqc gan longx meih nyei die hatc nyei waac, yaac maiv dungx guangc meih nyei maa njaaux nyei jauv-louc.
6.4: Maiv dungx bun meih nyei m'zing njipv jienv m'njormh, maiv dungx bun m'zing-ndopv nyuix.
6.28: Mienh haih yangh zieqc jienv douz nyei douz-taanx gu'nguaaic mingh, yaac maiv zuqc douz buov zaux fai?
6.33: Ninh zuqc mun, zuqc nyaiv, ninh zuqc baaic hmien, yietc liuz maiv haih sortv guangc.
6.35: Ninh maiv longc haaix nyungc buih bun ninh. Bun zingh nyeic ndongc haaix camv ninh hnyouv maiv nqaai.
6.19: zoux jaav zorng-zengx nyei mienh tauv qiex kungx cuotv gorngv-baeqc nyei waac, caux mienh yiem ninh nyei gorx-youz mbu'ndongx coqv lunc mienh.
6.34: Weic zuqc m'jangc dorn hanc, ninh m'daaih qiex jiez, taux jaauv win nyei ziangh hoc ninh maiv nyaangc zingh aqv.
6.18: hnyouv daav orqv nyei za'eix, zaux tiux siepv nyei mingh lorz orqv nyei sic,
6.22: Meih yangh jauv, ninh mbuo ziouc dorh meih, meih bueix nyei ziangh hoc, ninh mbuo oix beu jienv meih. Meih nyie daaih, ninh mbuo yaac caux meih gorngv.
6.23: Weic zuqc naaiv deix hatc nyei waac zoux norm dang, njaaux nyei waac zoux njang. Gorngv-njaaux, mborqv njaaux se benx jauv bun mienh duqv maengc ziangh,
6.13: Ninh nyapc m'zing, fengx zaux, buoz yaac nuqv jienv,
6.9: Mienh lueic mienh aah! Meih oix bueix taux haaix zanc? Meih oix m'njormh taux haaix zanc cingx jiez sin daaih?
6.26: Weic zuqc mienh haih longc yietc norm njuov nyei jaax-zinh cingv maaic sin nyei m'sieqv dorn, mv baac hienx nqox nyei auv zungv zorqv mienh jaaix mienh nyei maengc.
6.5: Oix zuqc njoux ndutv ganh hnangv njaih leih ndutv zaeng hlaang mienh nyei buoz, yaac hnangv norqc biaux ndutv zaeng koux mienh nyei buoz-ndiev.
6.27: Mienh haih qam jienv douz yaac maiv bun ninh nyei lui zuqc douz buov duqv nyei fai?
6.14: hnyouv pien daav orqv nyei za'eix, zanc-zanc coqv-huv.
6.3: yie nyei dorn aah! Meih oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor zoux njoux meih ganh, weic zuqc meih zuqc yiem meih nyei juangc laangz mienh nyei buoz-ndiev mi'aqv. Mingh aqv, mingh lorz meih nyei juangc laangz mienh aengx nyiemc ganh zoux faix qaqv tov.
6.7: Nziouv maiv maaih bieiv zeiv, maiv maaih jien, maiv maaih haaix dauh gunv,
6.10: Aengx bueix dangh, m'njormh dangh, qopv jienv buoz m'njormh da'hngatv dangh,
6.2: se gorngv meih gorngv nyei waac hlopv zuqc meih, meih nyei nzuih gorngv nyei waac ndoh jienv meih,
6.1: Yie nyei dorn aah! Se gorngv meih laengz waac beu meih nyei juangc laangz mienh nyei zaeqv, fai laengz zoux ndaam-daauh beu ganh dauh mienh nyei zaeqv,
6.31: Se gorngv ninh zuqc zorqv ninh oix zuqc buih siec gouv, zungv bun nzengc ninh nyei biauv zong maaih nyei ga'naaiv.
6.6: Mienh lueic mienh aah! Meih oix zuqc mingh zaah mangc nziouv, hnamv taux nziouv zoux nyei jauv ziouc duqv cong-mengh.
6.8: mv baac nqaai gorng ninh liuc leiz nyanc hopv, gaatv gaeng-zuangx nyei ziangh hoc yaac siou nyanc nyei ga'naaiv.
6.24: weic beu jienv meih, tengx meih simv nqoi orqv nyei m'sieqv dorn, leih nqoi buangh liouh nyei auv gorngv yuoqc mienh nyei nzuih mbiaangc.
6.25: Maiv dungx yiem hnyouv hanc ninh nzueic nyei jauv, yaac maiv dungx bun ninh nyei m'zing baeng zuqc meih.
6.29: Haaix dauh mingh caux ganh dauh mienh nyei auv yaac fih hnangv nyei. Maiv maaih haaix dauh hluo liuz ninh yaac maiv zuqc dingc zuiz.
6.11: jomc nyei jauv ziouc hnangv janx-zaqc liemh zeih taux. Dangx-donx nyei jauv daaih hnangv mienh dorh jienv wuoqc ginc daaih taux.
6.32: Mv baac mienh hienx auv ninh hnamv duqv hngongx haic. Haaix dauh hnangv naaiv zoux zungv bun ninh ganh zuqc mietc.
6.16: Ziouv  nzorng nyei maaih juqv nyungc, ninh gamh nziev nyei, youx nyei maaih siec nyungc.

8.21: Yie bun hnamv yie wuov deix nzipc zinh zoih bun ninh siou jaaix nyei ga'naaiv nyei dorngx buangv nzengc.
8.15: Hungh diex bangc yie gunv. Zoux hlo nyei mienh bangc yie liepc baengh fim nyei leiz.
8.12: “Yie se cong-mengh. Yie bun mienh haih hnamv duqv tong, maaih wuonh zaang yaac guai.
8.17: Hnamv yie wuov deix, yie yaac hnamv ninh mbuo, jienh lorz yie wuov deix yaac lorz duqv buatc.
8.30: wuov zanc yie yiem ninh nyei ga'hlen hnangv dauh zaangc mienh. Ninh hnoi-hnoi weic yie a'hneiv, yie yaac zanc-zanc yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien njien-youh haic.
8.20: Yie yangh zoux horpc nyei jauv, gan baengh fim nyei jauv-louc.
8.4: “Zuangx mienh aah! Yie heuc meih mbuo. Yie hungx jienv yietc zungv baamh mienh heuc.
8.28: Ninh bun lungh gu'nguaaic yiem duqv wuonv, yaac liepc ndau-ndiev nyei wuom-zingv wuov zanc,
8.33: Oix zuqc muangx yie njaaux nyei waac ziouc duqv cong-mengh, maiv dungx bungx lorx.
8.35: Haaix dauh lorz buatc yie ziouc duqv maengc ziangh.   Ziouv  yaac horpc hnyouv ninh.
8.19: Meih yiem yie duqv daaih nyei se gauh longx jiex jiem, zungv gauh longx jiex zien haic nyei jiem, yie cuotv nyei yaac gauh longx jiex zien nyaanh.
8.34: Muangx yie nyei waac wuov dauh maaih orn-lorqc, ninh hnoi-hnoi yiem yie nyei gaengh ndaangc mangc, yiem yie nyei gaengh ga'hlen zuov.
8.18: Zinh zoih caux njang-laangc yiem yie, yaac maaih yiem duqv wuonv nyei fuqv-loqc caux gong-fim.
8.22: “Ziouv jiez gorn zoux ninh nyei gong wuov zanc, ninh zeix yie ndaangc jiex, se ninh loz-hnoi zoux daaih nyei daauh nyungc gong.
8.23: Yiem loz-hnoi dongh cor wuov, maiv gaengh maaih baamh gen wuov zanc ninh liepc yie jiez daaih.
8.13: Taaih Ziouv nyei jauv se nzorng orqv nyei sic. Yie nzorng ceng-hlo, zoux maux nyei sic, zoux orqv nyei jauv caux gorngv-baeqc nduov mienh nyei waac.
8.9: Weic haih bieqc hnyouv nyei mienh, naaiv deix yietc zungv waac se zaqc nyei. Weic duqv wuonh zaang nyei mienh, naaiv deix waac se horpc nyei.
8.26: Yie cuotv seix ndaangc Tin-Hungh zeix ndau caux lingh deic. Lungh ndiev diqv dien nyei nie-mbung yaac maiv gaengh maaih.
8.5: Maiv hiuv haaix nyungc nyei mienh aah! Meih mbuo oix zuqc hoqc guai. Mienh hngongx mienh aah! Meih mbuo nyei hnyouv oix zuqc mengh baeqc.
8.27: Ninh liepc lungh yaac guetv huing gormx koiv-minc nyei lungh gorn wuov zanc, yie yiem naaic.
8.14: Yie haih tengx daav za'eix, maaih cong-mengh longx. Yie haih mengh baeqc yaac maaih qaqv.
8.3: Ninh yiem bieqc zingh nyei laatc gaengh ga'hlen, yiem bieqc gaengh nyei dorngx heuc mbui nyei gorngv,
8.7: weic zuqc yie nyei nzuih oix gorngv zien leiz, yie nyei nzuih meix gamh nziev haic orqv nyei jauv.
8.36: Mv baac haaix dauh lorz maiv buatc yie, ziouc hoic zuqc ganh. Nzorng yie wuov deix yietc zungv a'hneiv zuqc daic nyei jauv.”
8.10: Ginv longc yie njaaux nyei waac maiv zeiz nyaanh, ginv wuonh zaang maiv zeiz zien jiem,
8.2: Ninh yiem jauv-hlen hlang nyei dorngx, souv jienv jaapv-maaz jauv.
8.1: Cong-mengh heuc jienv maiv zeiz? Mengh baeqc nyei jauv heuc qiex hlo nyei maiv zeiz?
8.31: Yie a'hneiv ninh nyei baamh gen, yaac a'hneiv haic baamh mienh.
8.6: Muangx maah! Yie oix gorngv longx haic nyei waac. Haaix nyungc horpc nyei oix yiem yie nyei nzuih cuotv,
8.8: Yie nyei nzuih gorngv nyei yietc zungv waac horpc nyei, maiv maaih yietc deix ngau fai njuotv.
8.24: Maiv gaengh maaih koiv, maiv gaengh maaih wuom camv nyei wuom-zingv yie cuotv seix daaih aqv.
8.25: Domh mbong maiv gaengh duqv yiem dingc, fiuv-mbong yaac maiv gaengh maaih, yie zungv cuotv seix.
8.29: ninh dingc koiv nyei gapv-jaaix weic bun wuom maiv jiex ndaangc ninh hatc nyei waac, ninh yaac liepc dingc ndau nyei gorn-ndoqv,
8.11: weic zuqc cong-mengh se gauh longx jiex la'bieiv-jaaix, dongh meih oix nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv maiv haih beiv duqv cong-mengh.
8.32: “Yie nyei dorn aac, ih zanc muangx yie maah! Ei jienv yie nyei jauv zoux wuov deix maaih orn-lorqc.
8.16: Mouz dauh bieiv zeiv caux zoux hlo nyei mienh bangc yie gunv lungh ndiev.

24.21: Yie nyei dorn aac, oix zuqc taaih Ziouv yaac taaih hungh diex, maiv dungx ngaengc maiv muangx ninh mbuo i dauh nyei waac,
24.15: Maiv dungx mbaapv jienv zuov hnangv orqv mienh zuov jienv hoic kuv mienh nyei biauv. Maiv dungx zoux doqc, zoux waaic ninh yiem nyei dorngx,
24.12: Se gorngv meih gorngv, “Naaiv deix sic yie mbuo maiv hiuv,” Tin-Hungh, dongh nziang mienh nyei hnyouv wuov dauh, mangc duqv buatc maiv zeiz? Goux meih wuov dauh hiuv duqv meih nyei hnyouv maiv zeiz? Ninh yaac maiv zeiz oix ziux mienh zoux nyei winh bun ninh mbuo fai?
24.17: Meih nyei win-wangv ndorpc, meih maiv dungx a'hneiv. Ninh ndiqv zuqc ndorpc, maiv dungx orn-lorqc.
24.30: Yie jiex mienh lueic mienh nyei liangx-ndeic, jiex mienh hngongx mienh nyei a'ngunc huingx,
24.20: weic zuqc orqv mienh maiv maaih hoz nqaang. Mienh waaic mienh nyei dang yaac oix zuqc biomv daic.
24.4: Maaih wuonh zaang, biauv ziouc maaih longx haic, jaaix haic nyei ga'naaiv buangv.
24.28: Maiv dungx zoux maiv maaih gorn-baengx nyei zorng-zengx hoic juangc laangz mienh, yaac maiv dungx longc meih nyei nzuih nduov mienh.
24.33: aengx bueix dangh, m'njormh dangh, qopv jienv buoz m'njormh da'hngatv dangh,
24.19: Maiv dungx weic orqv mienh guaax hnyouv, yaac maiv dungx mueic jieqv mienh waaic mienh,
24.34: jomc nyei jauv ziouc liemh zeih taux hnangv janx-zaqc. Dangx-donx nyei jauv oix daaih hnangv mienh dorh jienv wuoqc ginc daaih taux.
24.18: Nziex Ziouv buatc ziouc maiv a'hneiv, yaac huin mingh ganh bung, maiv qiex jiez win-wangv.
24.22: weic zuqc maaih zeqc naanc oix liemh zeih yiem ninh mbuo i dauh daaih. Haaix dauh hiuv duqv ninh mbuo i dauh oix hnangv haaix nor bun mienh zuqc baaic?
24.23: Aengx jiex mingh maaih cong-mengh mienh gorngv nyei waac. Dunx sic nyei ziangh hoc mangc mienh nyei hmien se maiv horpc.
24.13: Yie nyei dorn aah! Gunv nyanc mueiz-dorngh weic zuqc mueiz-dorngh se longx haic. Nyanc mueiz-pengx ndiepv njiec nyei mueiz-dorngh haiz mueix doc gaam.
24.9: Hnamv cuotv zoux hngongx nyei sic benx zuiz. Mienh yaac youx huotv mienh nyei mienh.
24.26: Haaix dauh longc zien nyei waac dau, bun cing benx zien loz-gaeng doic.
24.5: Cong-mengh mienh maaih qaqv hlo. Maaih wuonh zaang nyei mienh jaa henv jienv faaux,
24.27: Oix zuqc zoux ziangx ga'nyiec nyei gong ndaangc, liuc leiz ziangx meih nyei lingh deic, nqa'haav cingx daaih gomv biauv.
24.14: Oix zuqc hiuv duqv meih nyei hnyouv duqv cong-mengh se hnangv wuov nor. Se gorngv meih lorz buatc cong-mengh, meih nqa'haav hingv nyei jauv ziouc maaih lamh hnamv nyei, yaac maiv zuqc jamv guangc.
24.3: Zoux biauv oix zuqc longc cong-mengh, yaac longc mengh baeqc nyei za'eix liepc daaih.
24.7: Cong-mengh nyei jauv weic mienh hngongx mienh ba'laqc hlang haic. Yiem zingh gaengh ninh maiv gorngv haaix nyungc aqv.
24.10: Se gorngv meih zuqc sic nyei hnoi meih hnyouv mau, meih nyei qaqv faix haic.
24.2: weic zuqc ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv daav doqc nyei za'eix. Ninh mbuo nyei nzuih gorngv orqv haic nyei waac.
24.1: Maiv dungx mueic jieqv orqv mienh, yaac maiv dungx maaih hnyouv oix caux ninh mbuo yiem,
24.31: mangc maah! Maaih njimv cuotv daaih buangv ndau-beih, maaih njimv nyei miev mbiorngz buangv, weih jienv nyei la'bieiv-laatc yaac mbaang.
24.6: weic zuqc meih mingh mborqv jaax oix zuqc bangc cong-mengh nyei za'eix, maaih caangh laangh nyei mienh camv ziouc duqv hingh jiex.
24.8: Daav za'eix zoux orqv sic wuov dauh ziouc duqv mienh heuc cuoqv sic mienh.
24.24: Haaix dauh gorngv mbuox orqv mienh, “Meih maiv maaih dorngc nyei dorngx,” wuov dauh ziouc zuqc maanc fingx zioux, zuqc maanc guoqv mienh youx.
24.25: Mv baac haaix dauh bun ninh zuqc dingc zuiz, wuov dauh ziouc a'hneiv, yaac oix duqv longx haic nyei fuqv.
24.29: Maiv dungx gorngv, “Yie oix zoux bun ninh hnangv ninh zoux bun yie. Ziux ninh zoux nyei yie oix winh bun ninh.”
24.11: Oix zuqc njoux dorh mingh daix daic nyei mienh, yaac dangv jienv lorpc lorpc ndorpc ndorpc nyei mingh zuqc daix daic wuov deix.
24.32: Yie yietc binc mangc, yietc binc hnamv, yie mangc liuz ziouc duqv hoqc hiuv yietc nyungc aqv,
24.16: weic zuqc kuv mienh ndorpc siec nzunc corc haih jiez sin daaih, mv baac orqv mienh zungv zuqc zeqc naanc mbienv njiec.

25.21: Se gorngv meih nyei win-wangv hnyouv sie, oix zuqc bun hnaangx ninh nyanc. Se gorngv ninh jaang nqaatv, oix zuqc bun wuom ninh hopv.
25.15: Longc noic yuoqc duqv zoux hlo nyei mienh. Gorngv waac suonc zungv haih bun ninh nyei hnyouv mau njiec.
25.12: Cong-mengh mienh kuinx maaih m'normh oix muangx nyei mienh se hnangv jiem-buoz-ndoqv-nzaeng fai zien jiem zoux daaih nyei siou-setv.
25.17: Meih oix zuqc lauh lauh mingh nzunc meih nyei juangc laangz mienh nyei biauv hnangv. Maiv zei aeqv, nziex meih bun ninh haiz kouv ninh ziouc nzorng meih aqv.
25.20: Haaix dauh baaux nzung bun hnyouv mun hnyouv nzauh nyei mienh muangx, se hnangv juangv nyei hnoi jaiv lui, yaac hnangv zorqv wuom-sui dox njiec zuqc mun nyei dorngx.
25.4: Zorqv cuotv nyaanh nqaiv, nyaanh zaangc ziouc duqv nyaanh daav cuotv ga'naaiv.
25.28: Mienh maiv haih gunv maiv duqv ganh, se hnangv mbaang waaic nyei zingh maiv maaih zingh laatc.
25.19: Zuqc zeqc naanc nyei ziangh hoc kaux maiv ziepc zuoqv nyei mienh se hnangv nyaah nquaqv fai zaux waaic.
25.18: Zoux jaav zorng-zengx hoic juangc laangz mienh wuov dauh se hnangv mborqv jaax nyei ndiangx-ndonx fai nzuqc ndaauv fai forng-cang laic.
25.22: Meih hnangv naaiv zoux ninh ziouc nyaiv aqv,   Ziouv yaac oix bun zingh nyeic meih.
25.23: Baqv bung nyei nziaaux dorh mbiungc daaih, mienh gorngv waac-huv yaac cuoqv mienh qiex jiez.
25.13: Ziepc zuoqv nyei douc fienx mienh bun paaiv ninh wuov deix ziouv nyei hnyouv fingv, hnangv siou gaeng-zuangx nyei ziangh hoc maaih sorng tengx laangh.
25.9: Se gorngv meih caux dauh juangc laangz mienh nzaeng, oix zuqc caux ninh mbenc sung, yaac maiv dungx dorh ninh gem jienv nyei sic mingh gorngv.
25.26: Kuv mienh nyiemc suei bun orqv mienh se hnangv njoqc nyei wuom-nyuonh fai laih hlopv nyei wuom-zingv.
25.5: Zorqv nqoi yiem hungh diex nyei nza'hmien nyei orqv mienh, ninh nyei hungh weic ziouc bangc baengh fim nyei jauv liepc gorn-ndoqv wuonv.
25.27: Nyanc mueiz-dorngh camv se maiv yaauc. Lorz mienh taaih ganh yaac maiv benx.
25.14: Mienh bungx waac-maux gorngv oix fungx zingh nyeic mv baac maiv fungx, se hnangv maaih mbuonx maaih nziaaux yaac maiv maaih mbiungc.
25.3: Lungh ndongc haaix hlang, ndau ndongc haaix ndo, hungh diex nyei hnyouv yaac hnangv wuov nor zaah maiv toux.
25.7: weic zuqc maaih mienh gorngv, “Faaux naaiv oc,” se gauh longx dorng jienv zoux hlo nyei mienh zuqc mienh heuc meih tuix njiec.
25.10: Nziex muangx haiz nyei mienh bun meih zuqc nyaiv. Meih waaic nyei mengh dauh yaac maiv haih longx aqv.
25.2: Zorqv sic gem jienv benx Tin-Hungh nyei njang-laangc, mv baac hungh diex nyei njang-laangc se ninh zorqv sic zaah cuotv daaih.
25.1: Yiem naaiv mingh yaac benx Saa^lo^morn nyei cong-mengh waac, dongh Yu^ndaa hungh, He^se^ki^yaa, nyei mienh ceu daaih.
25.6: Yiem hungh diex nyei nza'hmien maiv dungx taaih ganh hlo, fai souv jienv zoux hlo nyei mienh nyei dorngx,
25.8: Meih nyei m'zing buatc nyei maiv dungx siepv-siepv nyei dorh mingh wuov sic dorngh. Nziex maaih ganh nyei juangc laangz mienh daaih bun meih zuqc nyaiv, setv mueiz meih hnangv haaix nor zoux?
25.24: Yiem biauv-ngorh gu'nguaaic nyei gorqv corc gauh longx caux zanc-zanc nzaeng jaax nyei m'sieqv dorn juangc biauv yiem.
25.25: Maaih longx nyei fienx yiem go nyei deic-bung daaih, se hnangv jaang nqaatv nyei ziangh hoc hopv wuom-namx nor.
25.11: Gorngv yietc joux waac puix duqv horpc ziangh hoc, se hnangv norm longc jiem zoux daaih nyei biouv lorqc jienv nyaanh lorqc.
25.16: Se gorngv meih duqv mueiz-dorngh oix zuqc nyanc horpc. Nyanc camv jiex jaax nor, nziex haih lov cuotv.

29.21: Bou faix nyei ziangh hoc meih ei ninh nyei hnyouv bun ga'naaiv ninh, setv mueiz ninh zorqv nzengc meih maaih nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv.
29.15: Longc biaav mborqv njaaux yaac gorngv-njaaux, fu'jueiv ziouc jaa cong-mengh, mv baac se gorngv sueih fu'jueiv ei ganh nyei hnyouv zoux, ziouc bun maa zuqc nyaiv.
29.12: Se gorngv zoux hlo nyei mienh muangx gorngv-baeqc nyei waac, ninh nyei yietc zungv jien ziouc waaic nzengc.
29.17: Oix zuqc mborqv njaaux meih nyei dorn, ninh ziouc bun meih duqv hitv kuonx, ninh yaac oix bun meih nyei hnyouv a'hneiv.
29.20: Meih buatc nzuih siepv nyei mienh fai? Mienh hngongx mienh zungv maaih lamh hnamv gauh camv ninh.
29.4: Hungh diex longc baengh fim nyei jauv, guoqv ziouc liepc duqv wuonv, mv baac hungh diex aapv baeqc fingx cuotv nyaanh hmuangx ziouc bun guoqv zuqc baaic.
29.19: Kungx longc waac gorngv-njaaux bou hnangv se maiv gaux. Maiv gunv ninh mengh baeqc ninh maiv ei jienv zoux.
29.18: Haaix norm dorngx maiv maaih laauc yaangh nyei jauv, baeqc fingx ziouc maiv muangx leiz gunv, mv baac gan longx leiz-latc nyei mienh duqv orn-lorqc.
29.22: Ga'qiex beqv nyei mienh coqv cuotv nzaeng jaax nyei sic. Hungh hec qiex jiez nyei mienh baamz zuiz camv.
29.23: Mienh zoux maux ninh ziouc ndortv njiec aiv, mv baac mienh nyiemc ganh zoux faix ziouc duqv mienh taaih.
29.13: Mienh jomc mienh caux zeix mienh nyei mienh maaih yietc diuc fih hnangv, se Ziouv bun ninh mbuo i dauh nyei m'zing njang.
29.9: Se gorngv cong-mengh mienh caux mienh hngongx mienh nzaeng, mienh hngongx mienh youc qiex jiez youc jatv, zungv maiv haih sekv.
29.26: Mienh camv nyei lorz zoux hlo nyei mienh korv-lienh, mv baac se Ziouv bun mienh duqv baengh fim.
29.5: Mienh la'guaih ceng ninh nyei juangc laangz mienh se hnangv zaeng mungz nzenc ninh ganh nyei zaux.
29.27: Hnyouv maiv zingx nyei mienh zuqc kuv mienh youx, hnyouv zingx nyei mienh zuqc orqv mienh youx.
29.14: Se gorngv hungh diex baengh fim nyei siemv mienh jomc mienh, ninh nyei hungh weic yietc liuz liepc wuonv.
29.3: Haaix dauh hnamv cong-mengh, wuov dauh bun ninh nyei die a'hneiv, mv baac haaix dauh caux maaic sin nyei m'sieqv dorn jiu tong, wuov dauh zaaux nzengc ninh maaih nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv.
29.7: Kuv mienh hiuv duqv mienh jomc mienh horpc zuqc duqv nyei leiz, mv baac orqv mienh maiv bieqc hnyouv naaiv nyungc jauv.
29.10: Oix daix mienh nyei mienh hanc haic maiv maaih dorngx nqemh nyei mienh. Orqv mienh lorz hnyouv zingx nyei mienh nyei maengc.
29.2: Kuv mienh maaih hatc maaz camv jienv faaux, baeqc fingx njien-youh, mv baac orqv mienh zoux hlo gunv mienh, baeqc fingx njunh jienv yiem.
29.1: Haaix dauh zanc-zanc zuqc gorngv-hemx corc hnyouv ngaengc, wuov dauh ziouc liemh zeih zuqc mietc, maiv maaih za'eix goiv duqv nzuonx.
29.6: Orqv mienh baamz zuiz se hnangv zuqc ganh nyei zuiz zoux koux hlopv jienv, mv baac kuv mienh njien-youh, baaux nzung.
29.8: Zoux huotv mienh nyei mienh coqv bun zingh nyei mienh lunc nzengc, mv baac cong-mengh mienh haih donv duqv qiex jiez nyei jauv.
29.24: Haaix dauh caux janx-zaqc maaih buonc ziouc hanc ganh nyei maengc. Ninh haiz mienh houv nyei waac yaac maiv gorngv haaix nyungc.
29.25: Mienh gamh nziex mienh se benx koux hlopv, mv baac haaix dauh kaux Ziouv duqv yiem longx.
29.11: Mienh hngongx mienh bun ninh nyei ga'qiex baetv cuotv nzengc, mv baac cong-mengh mienh longc noic nyienz jienv.
29.16: Orqv mienh duqv lingc gunv, zuiz nyei jauv jaa camv, mv baac kuv mienh duqv buatc ninh mbuo zuqc baaic waaic nzengc.

11.21: Oix zuqc hiuv dingc, orqv mienh maiv haih biaux maiv ndutv zuqc dingc zuiz, mv baac kuv mienh zungv oix duqv njoux.
11.15: Haaix dauh beu ganh dauh mienh zungv oix zuqc kouv aqv. Mv baac haaix dauh nzorng beu mienh nyei jauv ziouc yiem duqv wuonv.
11.12: Haaix dauh mangc piex juangc laangz mienh se hnamv maiv tong haaix nyungc nyei mienh. Mv baac bieqc hnyouv nyei mienh sekv nzieqc nyei.
11.17: Korv-lienh mienh nyei mienh tengx ganh duqv longx, mv baac zoux doqc nyei mienh hoic zuqc ganh.
11.30: Kuv mienh zoux nyei sic se bun mienh maaih maengc ziangh, mv baac mienh baamz leiz-latc ziouc hoic mienh guangc maengc.
11.20: Hnyouv buv longh buv dangv nyei mienh,   Ziouv  youx haic, mv baac zoux duqv horpc nyei mienh bun ninh a'hneiv.
11.4: Zuqc Tin-Hungh nouz nyei hnoi, zinh zoih tengx maiv duqv haaix nyungc, mv baac zoux duqv horpc nyei sic haih njoux mienh biaux ndutv maiv zuqc daic.
11.28: Haaix dauh kaux ninh ganh nyei zinh zoih zungv zuqc ndorpc, mv baac kuv mienh oix wangc siangx hnangv ndiangx-normh nyiemz.
11.19: Haaix dauh liepc hnyouv zoux kuv sic ziouc duqv maengc ziangh, haaix dauh lorz orqv nyei sic ziouc zuqc daic.
11.18: Orqv mienh nyei gong-zinh setv mueiz se maiv duqv haaix nyungc, mv baac mienh zoux horpc nyei jauv, ndongc haaix zungv duqv zingh nyeic.
11.22: M'sieqv dorn nzueic mv baac zieqv maiv duqv haaix nyungc horpc se hnangv norm jiem-kuing cunx jienv dungz nyei mba'zorng.
11.23: Kuv mienh oix nyei, setv mueiz duqv longx, orqv mienh maaih lamh hnamv nyei, setv mueiz zuqc Tin-Hungh nouz.
11.13: Jiex naaiv jiex wuov gorngv henh waac nyei mienh gorngv cuotv gem jienv nyei jauv, mv baac bungx duqv hnyouv nyei mienh gem jienv maiv horpc zuqc gorngv nyei sic.
11.9: Maiv kaux Tin-Hungh nyei mienh longc nzuih gorngv nyei waac baaic waaic ninh nyei juangc laangz mienh, mv baac kuv mienh nyei wuonh zaang haih njoux duqv ninh.
11.26: Haaix dauh ngaengc jienv maiv maaic laangh ziqc, ninh zuqc mienh zioux. Haaix dauh laengz maaic ziouc duqv mienh buang waac.
11.5: Maiv maaih dorngx nqemh nyei mienh zoux hnyouv zingx, ziouc dorh ninh yangh zaqc nyei jauv, mv baac orqv mienh laaix ninh zoux nyei orqv sic bun ninh ndorpc.
11.27: Haaix dauh jienh lorz zoux longx nyei jauv ziouc duqv mienh taaih, mv baac haaix dauh lorz orqv nyei sic wuov dauh ziouc zuqc orqv sic.
11.14: Maiv maaih mienh dorh, baeqc fingx ziouc zuqc baaic njiec, mv baac maaih caangh laangh nyei mienh camv, ziouc duqv baengh orn nyei yiem.
11.3: Hnyouv zingx nyei mienh maaih ziepc zuoqv nyei jauv dorh ninh mbuo, mv baac hnyouv ngau hnyouv njuotv nyei mienh zoux maiv ziepc zuoqv nyei sic bun ganh zuqc mietc.
11.7: Orqv mienh daic mingh, ninh maaih lamh hnamv nyei caux jienv zuqc mietc, mienh waaic mienh hnamv oix duqv nyei yaac baaic nzengc mi'aqv.
11.10: Kuv mienh duqv longx, zingh nyei mienh njien-youh, orqv mienh zuqc mietc zuangx mienh njien-youh nyei heuc.
11.2: Mienh zoux maux ziouc maaih nyaiv nyei sic gan jienv daaih, mv baac nyiemc ganh zoux faix nyei mienh maaih cong-mengh.
11.1: Ziouv nzorng haic waengc mienh nyei nziangx, mv baac baengh fim nyei nziangx-dorh bun ninh a'hneiv.
11.31: Se gorngv kuv mienh yiem baamh gen ziux zoux nyei winh bun ninh, orqv mienh caux zuiz-mienh ziux zoux nyei zuqc winh bun ndongc haaix camv!
11.6: Hnyouv zingx nyei mienh zoux duqv horpc ziouc njoux duqv ninh, hnyouv maiv zingx nyei mienh hanc nyei sic hlopv jienv ninh.
11.8: Kuv mienh duqv njoux biaux ndutv kuonx naanh, daaux nzuonx orqv mienh buangh zuqc kouv naanc.
11.24: Maaih laanh mienh zoux hnyouv jangv yaac gunv zoux gunv butv zoih. Maaih laanh zoux hnyouv hepc, horpc zuqc bun nyei ninh maiv bun, mv baac gunv zoux gunv jomc.
11.25: Hnyouv jangv nyei mienh oix duqv bungx-zuoqc. Haaix dauh bun wuom mienh hopv, mienh ziouc bun wuom ninh hopv.
11.29: Haaix dauh zoux bun ganh nyei hmuangv doic zuqc kouv, setv mueiz maiv duqv haaix nyungc, mienh hngongx mienh yaac oix zuqc zoux cong-mengh mienh nyei bou.
11.11: Weic kuv mienh duqv fuqv, zingh ziouc duqv mienh taaih, mv baac laaix orqv mienh nyei nzuih gorngv nyei waac, zingh zuqc mbienv nzengc.
11.16: Hnyouv longx, nzueic nyei m'sieqv dorn duqv mienh taaih, zoux doqc nyei m'jangc dorn kungx duqv butv zoih.

16.21: Maaih cong-mengh nyei hnyouv, mienh heuc benx bieqc hnyouv nyei mienh. Gorngv waac longx, jaa baeng duqv mienh.
16.15: Hungh diex nyei hmien njang ziouc bun mienh haih duqv maengc ziangh, hungh diex horpc hnyouv se hnangv mbuonx dorh jienv cun-gen nyei mbiungc daaih nor.
16.12: Hungh diex zoux orqv se gamh nziev haic nyei sic, weic zuqc hungh weic bangc baengh fim nyei leiz liepc daaih.
16.17: Hnyouv zingx mienh gan nyei jauv-louc simv nqoi orqv sic. Haaix dauh goux longx ganh nyei jauv ziouc goux ganh nyei maengc.
16.30: Mienh nyapc m'zing ninh daav nduov mienh nyei za'eix, nqapc nzuih meix wuov dauh bun orqv sic cuotv daaih.
16.20: Haaix dauh gan longx njaaux nyei waac ziouc duqv longx, haaix dauh kaux Ziouv yaac duqv orn-lorqc.
16.4: Ziouv zeix nyungc-nyungc weic wuov nyungc nyei eix leiz, liemh orqv mienh se weic zeqc naanc nyei hnoi.
16.28: Buv longh buv dangv nyei mienh coqv mienh nzaeng jaax. Gorngv waac-huv nyei mienh hoic loz-gaeng doic bun nqoi.
16.33: Mienh dingc maengc mangc, mv baac dingc nyei se yiem Ziouv daaih.
16.19: Nyiemc ganh zoux faix caux mienh jomc mienh yiem, gauh longx zorqv guaatv daaih nyei ga'naaiv caux zoux maux nyei mienh bun nqoi.
16.18: Zoux maux nyei jauv dorh mienh mingh zuqc mietc, hnyouv ceng-hlo bun mienh zuqc ndorpc.
16.22: Weic maaih cong-mengh nyei mienh, cong-mengh benx ziangh maengc nyei wuom-zingv, mv baac mienh hngongx mienh zuqc ninh mbuo hngongx nyei jauv dingc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz.
16.23: Cong-mengh mienh nyei hnyouv njaaux ninh gorngv waac horpc, ninh nyei nzuih gorngv nyei waac yaac gauh haih baeng duqv mienh.
16.13: Mienh nyei nzuih gorngv zien nyei waac hungh diex a'hneiv, ninh yaac hnamv gorngv zingx nyei waac nyei mienh.
16.9: Mienh nyei hnyouv daav za'eix lorz ganh nyei jauv, mv baac Ziouv yienz ninh yangh nyei zaux-mbiec.
16.26: Mienh kouv laaix sung nzuih, ninh nyei nzuih zunc ninh mingh.
16.5: Da'faanh hnyouv maux nyei mienh Ziouv youx haic, oix zuqc hiuv dingc, ninh zungv biaux maiv ndutv, oix zuqc dingc zuiz.
16.27: Maiv lamh longc nyei mienh daav za'eix zoux orqv sic, ninh gorngv nyei waac hnangv douz ziqv mienh.
16.14: Hungh diex qiex jiez bun cing mienh oix zuqc daic, mv baac cong-mengh mienh haih donv hungh diex nyei ga'qiex.
16.3: Oix zuqc zorqv meih zoux nyei nyungc-nyungc jiu bun Ziouv, meih daav nyei za'eix ziouc liepc duqv jiez.
16.7: Se gorngv mienh zoux nyei jauv bun Ziouv a'hneiv,   Ziouv yaac bun wuov dauh nyei win-wangv caux ninh horpc.
16.10: Hungh diex gorngv waac maaih Tin-Hungh nyei hatc maaz. Siemv dingc nyei ziangh hoc ninh nyei nzuih yaac maiv gorngv dorngc.
16.2: Mienh zoux nyei yietc zungv ziux ganh nyei m'zing mangc se cing-nzengc nyei, mv baac Ziouv  zaah mangc hnyouv.
16.1: Mienh yiem hnyouv daav za'eix, mv baac nzuih dau nyei waac se yiem Ziouv daaih.
16.31: Mba'biei baeqc se njang-laangc nyei ningv, se weic mienh yiem seix zaangc gan zoux horpc nyei jauv duqv daaih.
16.6: Mienh ziepc zuoqv gan longx Tin-Hungh ziouc duqv zuiz guangc liuz, mienh taaih Ziouv ziouc duqv simv nqoi orqv sic.
16.8: Maaih ga'naaiv zoqc mv baac zoux duqv zingx, se gauh longx maaih ga'naaiv camv mv baac zoux maiv baengh fim.
16.24: Gorngv waac longx se hnangv mueiz-dorngh gaam nyei, bun hnyouv kuh yiem, sin yaac wangc siangx.
16.25: Maaih diuh jauv mienh funx se horpc nyei, mv baac naaiv diuh jauv setv mueiz dorh mienh mingh zuqc daic.
16.29: Mienh doqc mienh yuoqc ninh nyei juangc laangz mienh, yaac dorh ninh yangh maiv benx nyei jauv.
16.11: Horpc nyei tin-baengh dangv caux nziangx benx Ziouv nyei, yiem mbuoqc nyei yietc zungv dangv-dorh, nziangx-dorh se ninh zoux nyei.
16.32: Maiv qiex jiez siepv nyei mienh se gauh longx henv nyei mienh, haih gunv duqv ganh nyei hnyouv se gauh longx mborqv duqv yietc norm zingh.
16.16: Duqv cong-mengh se gauh longx jiex duqv jiem, ginv duqv wuonh zaang se gauh longx ginv duqv nyaanh.
